definition: tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies

sentences.english: I'll take care of your fishing gear, that way you can better appreciate the fish here.
sentences.chinese: 爲了讓您更好地觀魚，我先幫您保管漁具吧。
他真是一款完美的暴力漁具。

sentences.english: Nemipterus virgatus gillnet is one of the main fishing gears in South China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 金線魚刺網是南海區的主要漁具之一。

sentences.english: Plastics and fishing gear are an ongoing danger.
sentences.chinese: 塑料和漁具是正在持續的危險。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a squid fishhook, in particular to a novel retractable squid fishhook design.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及魷釣鉤漁具，一種新型伸縮式魷釣鉤設計。

sentences.english: Our company is a floating production to the main drift of professional gear Zapin enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 我公司是一家以生產浮漂爲主的專業漁具雜品企業。

sentences.english: So I got to re-open my tackle box and tie new set of hook for him.
sentences.chinese: 所以我便重新打開收好了的漁具箱幫他把新勾裝好。
漁具纏住我船的螺旋槳。

sentences.english: In serious cases, his fishing gear may also be confiscated and his fishing licence revoked.
sentences.chinese: 情節嚴重的，並可以沒收漁具，吊銷捕撈許可證。

sentences.english: In serious cases, his fishing gear may also be confiscated.
sentences.chinese: 情節嚴重，並可以沒收漁具。

definition: to make an amphibious assault/to seize a beachhead/to gain a foothold in (a new market)
lit. to use the eastern wind (idiom)/fig. to use sb's help
(bird species of China) grey heron (Ardea cinerea)
